title: Eric Trump’s American Bitcoin going public in latest crypto move by president’s family
summary: Donald Trump Jr. and Eric Trump's bitcoin mining firm, American Bitcoin, went public through its merger with Gryphon Digital Mining. The company's public shares will serve as yet another vehicle for purchasing influence with the Trump family
